name: Indoor Rock Climbing VR
description: Fun and simple indoor Virtual Reality rock climbing center for both casual and avid gamers. Precise hands-on movement. Music included.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1, or Windows 10 Processor: Intel i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 290 Storage: 400 MB available space
